description: This a great application for transcribing audio data. The interface is clean, options useful, and it's fast. I haven't tried the software with a physical pedal, but it does the job for transcribing long or short audio data with a mouse and keyboard. Thanks to the developer(s)!
summary: Functional, clean, and effective transcription software

description: aplikasi ini berguna bagi saya untuk mengetik hasil alat perekam suara, di libreoffice. tapi saya berharap ada yang membuat aplikasi pengetikan suara menjadi text dari pembuat parlatype ini. terima kasih
The ideal combination of functions and simplicity. Big respect to the developer. Have been using it for several years already.
Such a perfect app for my use.
summary: Why I didn't find it earlier?

description:
Funktioniert bei mir nur, wenn es übr flatpak installiert wird:
sudo flatpak install flathub org.parlatype.Parlatype
flatpak run org.parlatype.Parlatype
summary: Buggy nach Installation über Software Center

description: I used Parlatype in ordre to transcribe audio files in LibreOffice (7.0.6.2). I built the LibreOffice extension (sources available via the ParlaType github site). Once you have configured the default speech-to-text engine you want to use with ParlaType (via the Settings tab), it works nicely. The only limitation is that the default TTS engines proposed only cover English, Chinese and German.
summary: Works nicely for transcripting English audio files

description: висит уже сутки не скачивается от слова совсем
само установилось. дебиан 11. когда все программы удалил. предустановленные. они мне просто не нужны. аналогичными програмами не пользуюсь. эту тоже программу удалю. она мне не нужна.
